_meanings:
{@--1@}
Knowledge acquired by oneself and
not handed down by tradition, 
invention, primitive or untaught
knowledge; usually in <ab>comp.</ab> which
is treated as a neuter noun ( 
<ls>P. II. 4. 21</ls>); {#pARinerupajYA pARinyupajYaM graMTaH#}
<ls>Sk.</ls>; {#prAcetasopajYaM rAmAyaRaM#} <ls>R. 15. 63.</ls>
